snippet: The agency said that the tests would not be the end of its work to determine whether the roadside devices are safe.
abstract: Federal Highway Admin officials report that initial tests of ET-Plus guardrail system made by Trinity Industries show that the roadside devices meet criteria; results of four more test have yet to be released.
lead_paragraph: The agency said that the tests would not be the end of its work to determine whether the roadside devices are safe.

headline.main: Guardrail System Passes First Tests, U.S. Agency Says
headline.print_headline: Guardrail System Passes First Tests, U.S. Agency Says
